attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The AGAA could keep gang members off the street in which help by reducing gang numbers.

We could make our communities safer with these programs and associations.

If you support this please sing

Why you should support these ideas?

. Cause we will make the communites better and give our kids a future 

.We will reduce the number of gang members on the streets 

.So we could live in a violence free world

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
